cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I give you warmth.
😎 You need sunglasses to look at me.
🌻 Plants love me!

cosmos.question: I am round and you live on me. I am home to plants, animals, and you. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌍 I am also called the 'Blue Planet'.
🌱 Things grow here!

cosmos.question: I come out at night, and I change my shape. Sometimes I'm full, sometimes I'm a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves are associated with me.
🌑 I reflect light from the Sun.
🧀 I am not made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I am very far away and twinkle at night. I am a giant ball of hot gas. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am in constellations.
🔥 I am like a tiny sun.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me better.

cosmos.question: I am a group of many stars that make a picture in the night sky. What am I?

hints.text: I have familiar shapes like animals and people.
🌌 People use me to find their way.
✨ The Big Dipper is one.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars, dust, and gas, held together by gravity. Our Sun lives in one! What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am often a spiral shape.
🔭 The Milky Way is one.
✨ I contain billions of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, rocky body that orbits the Sun, but I am smaller than a planet. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am found in the asteroid belt.
💥 Sometimes I can crash into planets.
🪨 I am much smaller than the Earth.

cosmos.question: I am a ball of ice and dust that flies through space. I have a tail that points away from the Sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am like a dirty snowball.
☀️ I get brighter as I get closer to the Sun.
✨ My tail is made of gas and dust.

cosmos.question: I am a very large planet made mostly of gas. I have a big red spot. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I have many moons.
💨 I am the biggest planet in our solar system.
🔴 My red spot is a giant storm.

cosmos.question: I am the farthest planet from the Sun in our solar system. I am a cold, blue giant made of gas. What am I?

hints.text: 🥶 I am the farthest planet from the Sun.
💨 I have very strong winds.
🔵 I am a very pretty blue color.

ocean.question: I am big and blue, and fish like to swim in me. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I am made of water.
🚢 Boats can sail on me.
🏖️ You can play on the beach next to me.

ocean.question: I have a shell and I crawl on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🐌 I am slow.
🏠 I carry my home on my back.
🦀 Sometimes people eat me

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in coral reefs. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I am small.
🌈 I have bright colors.
🏠 I live in a coral.

ocean.question: I am a big fish with sharp teeth. People are sometimes scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🦷 I have many rows of teeth.
🌊 You can see me in Jaws

ocean.question: I am a very large animal that lives in the ocean. I sing and spout water. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am the biggest animal on Earth.
🎶 I can sing songs
🌬️ I breathe through a hole on my back.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I have no bones.
✨ I can change color to hide.
🦑 I can release ink.

ocean.question: I am a type of rock that grows underwater and is home to many fish. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I am built by tiny animals.
🧱 I can be very colorful.
🏠 Many creatures live in me.

ocean.question: I am a very slow creature that looks like a horse, but lives in the ocean. What am I?

hints.text: 🐴 I have a horse-like head.
🌿 I wrap my tail around seaweed.
👶 The dad carries the eggs!

ocean.question: I'm a sea creature with a shell, and if you listen closely, you can hear the ocean inside. What am I?

hints.text: 🐚 I used to be the home of a sea creature.
👂 You can hold me to your ear to hear the sea.
🌊 I am found on the beach

ocean.question: I’m a creature that looks like a star and lives at the bottom of the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌟 I have arms, but not like you.
🚶 I move very slowly.
🖐️ I usually have five arms.
